item.description:
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types with Herb acting out each type with hats and a song for each type. You'll discover your type, important people in your life, and how to relate to each type. Great way to learn which types of people are more likely a fit for you. Single people tend to attend more often.

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram teacher, therapist and workshop leader for groups and and organizations. He is the author of Herb's Tips for Living and The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

Goes to 10pm

www.herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Next to Dunkin Donuts just past Arlington Center and just before Walgreens
item.name: Enneagram Basic Workshop
